UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Molecular Design, Structural Analysis and Antifungal Activity of Derivatives of Peptide CGA-N46.
Literature.Author: Li RF, Lu ZF, Sun YN, Chen SH, Yi YJ, Zhang HR, Yang SY, Yu GH, Huang L, Li CN

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida glabrata ATCC 90525(MIC=110µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 20224(MIC=130µM),Candida krusei ATCC 6258(MIC=130µM),Candida tropicalis ATCC 20240(MIC=73µM),Candida albicans ATCC 2048(MIC=130µM)
